about_the_game:
Aetherbound is a run-based auto-battler where you assemble a team of mystical Aetherkin and battle against increasingly powerful foes in an ever-scaling challenge. Carefully choose your team, adapt to enemy modifiers, and push forward until you can go no further. Each run is a test of strategy, endurance, and tactical decision-making.

Ascension & Growth

As you progress, you'll earn Ascension Points to upgrade your Aetherkin and Mastery Points to invest in a vast talent tree. Some rounds offer special rewards, such as unlocking a new Aetherkin for your run or expanding your roster size, letting you build stronger, more diverse strategies.

Enemy Modifiers & Strategic Consumables

No two battles are the same—randomized enemy modifiers shape the difficulty, forcing you to adapt your tactics. If a fight looks too dangerous, consumable items can reroll, weaken, or remove modifiers, letting you mitigate threats at key moments.

Win Condition & Endless Mode

For players who seek true endurance, an Endless Mode awaits, where difficulty escalates indefinitely. Compete for leaderboard rankings and prove how far your team can push the limits.

Unlock & Experiment with Aetherkin

Each successful run unlocks new Aetherkin, expanding your starting options for future attempts. While you may have encountered these creatures in previous runs, unlocking them ensures more strategic depth and replayability, letting you refine your team composition.

Dynamic & Replayable

With scaling difficulty, randomized modifiers, unlockable Aetherkin, and strategic consumable usage, no two runs will ever feel the same. Aetherbound is a game of tactical adaptation, rewarding skillful decision-making and smart resource management.

Whether you’re a fan of auto-battlers, strategy games, or roguelikes, Aetherbound delivers an engaging experience filled with challenging battles, evolving strategies, and endless replayability. How far will your Aetherkin take you before the run comes to an end?

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated Graphics Card Required

  • Processor: Intel Ivy Bridge/Zen 3 or Newer
